title: Book of Lost Souls (2005) #3
description:
The destinies of most people are defined early on. Then there are the others: The Lost. Those whose numbers aren’t in yet, who could go toward the light or toward the darkness-indeed, who could be tipped one direction or another. And everything starts with the book. That’s what Jonathan discovers when he takes a suicide plunge off the London bridge more than a century ago—and lands in the present. With the power of the Dark Man behind him—and the help of a cat named Mystery—Jonathan travels to the Lost, revealing their destinies as he discovers his own. When Jonathan encounters a talented runaway artist, he must help her choose between the easy path and the road less traveled. J. Michael Stracynski (Amazing Spider-Man, Supreme Power) blends timeless fantasy with modern storytelling in this new ongoing series.

32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP …$2.99
